import {Link, useNavigate} from "react-router-dom"; import {useDispatch, useSelector} from "react-redux"; import {useEffect} from "react"; import {loginUser} from "../../services/userService"; import {Field, Form, Formik} from "formik"; export default function Login() { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleLogin = async (values)=>{ await dispatch(loginUser(values)) await navigate('/home') } return ( <> {mess &&

{mess.state}

} { handleLogin(values).then() }}>
Welcome
Don’t have an account? Sign Up
) }
